alert.note: Alert for Union (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 04 at 3:46PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Union and northeastern Fannin Counties through 415 PM EDT... At 345 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was over Hemp, or 8 miles east of Blue Ridge, moving west at 10 mph. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Morganton, Hemp, Hurst, Loving and Mineral Bluff. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
